long_description: The Thule CX 2 Jogging Kit converts your Thule Chariot CX 2 Stroller into a high-performance running stroller. Includes 2 ezClick(TM) aluminum jogging arms and 16 in. quick-release wheel. Schwalbe Tracer tire for faster rolling; simple and easy installation; locked wheel ensures a steady ride.
short_description: The Thule CX 2 Jogging Kit converts your Thule Chariot CX 2 Stroller into a high-performance running stroller.
